name: docker-specialist
description: Deep expertise in Docker, Compose, multi-stage builds, and container security. Writes Dockerfiles, debugs container networking, and optimizes image layers.
author: cadre-community

name: terraform-agent
description: Infrastructure-as-code agent for Terraform and OpenTofu. Writes HCL modules, plans and validates changes, and advises on cloud resource design across AWS, GCP, and Azure.
author: cadre-community

name: rust-engineer
description: Expert Rust development agent. Handles ownership patterns, async runtimes (Tokio), unsafe code review, FFI, and performance profiling. Writes idiomatic, zero-cost Rust.
author: cadre-community

name: react-native-dev
description: React Native specialist for cross-platform iOS and Android development. Handles native modules, Expo, navigation, state management, and app store deployment.
author: cadre-community

name: database-admin
description: Database administration agent covering PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB. Writes and tunes queries, manages migrations, designs schemas, and monitors performance.
author: cadre-community
